Its become an efficient wealth stripping machine, and will remain so until the s&p prints its true intrinsic value of 450-575, posibly lower. This will institute structural changez, in a midst of fear and hate, the system will be purged and reset, and barring any global war or zombie attack - we will come out of ashez very slowly but healed . There will be mucho pain getting there though, including breach of contracts on derivativez.

Topic.Title: Yo tech, how those leaps hold'in up?

Message.Msg: There really is still a path to bring the system back into balance without a catastrophic failure. But, there really only is 1 path and it will still be painful. At present, it appears that TPTB would rather engage in tacit collusion and take the market further out of balance for the last nickels, putting all trust in modern financial systems at risk. The unadulterated greed to catch those last nickels rather than restore balance will prove catastrophic and this time I doubt suffering public will let the banks or the individuals behind this mess walk away...

Message.Title: Short interest down to 6.1MM
Message.Msg: Down 5.1MM shares from last year. Meanwhile AAPL and stocks with any fundamental basis for their valuations have high short interest relative to historical norms... At some point, the game being played will be exposed. Wonder what the success rate (100% in Q1 for JPM and BAC) correlation is on non-POMO days or in periods without QE. Wonder whether the divergence between fundamentals and stock prices increases or decreases when QE is in effect... There are several clear analytics that could be done to highlight how certain institutions are using asymmetric leverage to bully the market against fundamentals to extract trading profits...

Topic.Title: Action: Sell Short - right at the fiddy

Message.Msg: I look at the market internals and ES everyday throughout the days. Daily advanced issues consistently exceed declined issues and $TICK stay over 0 a large percentage of the time. The SPX is now trading at the top end of its ascending channel. Although I cannot tell if the upside is caused by squeezing shorts or genuine buying longs, and boy the bulls are so damn strong everyday it is un-freaking believable! Today is the first time in days I've seen a crack in the ES, but the risk is still on the upside simply because the SPX closed yet another higher low. Making it only an inside day. SPX can still creep along the upper channel and cause bears to feel pain. I am still cautiously optimistic that there will be a pull back soon. It is hard to fight an $85B/month un-natural market using a natural economic mindset. I'd be more optimistic if SPY pops above the upper channel which causes it to over extended, or evidence in a really pull back. As for now, AMZN trades along with SPX in rhythmic through out the day. I'd be cautious that the overall market is setting up a bear trap with this enormous QE pumping. Peace.

Topic.Title: Action: Sell Short - right at the fiddy

Message.Msg: I believe that the effect of QE will slowly wear off due to higher risk as this market churn up. At some point, the risk will be too great that QE will do very little to pump the market. So they either has to continue or do more QE, or admit defeat and stop QE. The latter is very unlikely, so I genuinely believe that any dip in prices should be bought. I can't see how it will be good for the little guy, on one hand you have high inflation and on the other hand you have a nasty recession/depression. QE is designed to soften the blow of the recovery and quicken the recovery phase. The central bankers thought they could play god but god has other plans.

Message.Msg: I agree. It is not capitalism. It is financialism. It is run by the banks for the banks. The run on gold has started. Eventually, people will realize the opportunity is to own distinctive physical and productive knowledge assets and to get away from "financial assets" controlled by the banks/Fed for the benefit of the banks. The winners will be those moving out of overvalued liquid financial assets and into privately held physical and productive intellectual assets, particularly focused on key societal challenges (energy, food water) that are nearly intractable problems and not going away.

Message.Title: YouTube subscription channels...
Message.Msg: $.99 to $2.99 on demand and a la carte. Reaching its BILLION users. Let's see. Google has $50B plus $15B a year in TRUE FCF. I wonder if they can create match Amazon's content offering and reach... Google is about to put Amazon in a world of hurt across most of its businesses. Unlike Amazon, Google's cash flow and ROIC are very high. Chrome momentum is really just starting (nice ads of late). It will take the Play Store to another level and integrate YouTube subscriptions into the mix. Google shopping focuses on the information layer and partnerships for retail and delivery (a vastly more capital efficient model that is better aligned to retailer incentives). Meanwhile, Amazon is busy killing its cash position and cash flow building out additional distribution and warehouse facilities that do not materially change to the cost to serve (deliver to the door). Now, it is adding 3D phones to its stable of loss leaders... But, it will make it up in volume.

Topic.Title: Every Scam POS Stock Had a Headfake Rally Today

Message.Msg: "Good stocks being owned by more fiscally responsible crowd " Cooooooorrrrection! In these markets, there are no 'good stox' and there havent been for yearz. Stox, all stox, are worthless unsecured bitcoin digital credits in a trade account whose only value iz what the knucklehead or robot on the other end of the wire will pay for it during market hourz at the very millisecond you want to sell it. This assumez that the markets a functioning properly, free of corcuit breakerz, phlash crashez, financial hax, broker lockouts, telecom / fiber optic coms interruptionz, and material acts of god. this excludez nights, weekendz, and holidayz. During any of theze timez a stox value iz 0.00. You cant eat em, drink em, fuel macinery, or seek shelter under them and you cant sell them to do any of these thingz. The sole purpose of an unsecured, uninsured stok iz to serve az a proxy to transfer financial wealth from the many to the few az efficiently az possible. You'll come to fully understand this concept of sybil's over the next 18-24 months if you stay stay long 'good stox'. In scam markets there are no sacred cowz, only slaughtered sheep.

Message.Msg: 99% of this is due to the funny money being printed by the Fed. When money is essentially free and meaningless lots of very strange things can happen. Nobody cares about valuation, money is free to borrow and there's a glut of it. The markets are flooded with this funny money and it moves it to astronomical heights with very little fundamental support. This ends with the loss of the dollar as the world's currency. When that happens it's going to be quite a spectacular fall. We're talking sub 4000 Dow in a hearbeat. Don't think it can happen?
